question: Who is the 18-year-old artist, who won four prizes at the Grammy awards 2020?
explanation:
The 18-year-old singer cum songwriter from Los Angeles, Billie Eilish won top four prizes at Grammy Awards including Record of the year, Song of the year, Best album and Best new artist.
Billie created a history in the Grammy awards by becoming the youngest artist ever to win album of the year for her debut album, â€œWhen We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?\". The record was previously held by the famous musician Taylor Swift for her album \"Fearless\" in 2010 awards, when she was 20 years old.
